metadata.feature_description: Import and export wiki articles for backup or migration

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Access Import/Export Content from Module Actions

steps.action: Navigated to Wiki Test page and entered Edit mode
steps.expected: Edit mode enabled with module action menus visible
steps.actual: Edit mode enabled successfully with module action menus visible

steps.action: Clicked on Admin menu for Wiki module to find Import/Export option
steps.expected: Import/Export Content option visible in module actions
steps.actual: Admin menu only contains: Settings, Help, Develop, Delete, Refresh - NO Import/Export option

steps.action: Opened Module Settings to check for Import/Export tab
steps.expected: Import/Export tab or option in module settings
steps.actual: Module Settings contains tabs: Module Settings, Permissions, Page Settings, Wiki - NO Import/Export tab
Wiki tab only contains Mode and Enable Comments settings - NO Import/Export option

issues: The Wiki module does not have a dedicated Import/Export Content feature accessible from Module Actions as described in the UI Location. The ContentExchangeController.cs in the codebase implements DNN's IContentExchangeController interface for platform-level Site Import/Export, not a module-specific action.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Wiki content accessible via DNN Site Import/Export

steps.action: Navigated to Settings > Import / Export in persona bar
steps.actual: Site Import/Export page loaded showing Import/Export Log with previous operations

steps.action: Selected 'My Website' and clicked Export Data
steps.expected: Export options page with content selection
steps.actual: Export Data page opened with options including Content toggle (ON) and Pages selection

steps.action: Expanded Pages tree to verify Wiki Test page is included
steps.expected: Wiki Test page visible and selectable for export
steps.actual: Wiki Test page is visible and checked in the Pages in Export tree, confirming Wiki content can be exported via Site Export

observations: The Wiki module does NOT have a dedicated 'Import/Export Content' option in Module Actions as specified in the UI Location (Module Actions > Import/Export Content)

Code review of ContentExchangeController.cs confirms it implements DNN's IContentExchangeController interface, which integrates with DNN's platform-level Site Import/Export framework rather than providing a standalone module action
Wiki content can be exported and imported through DNN's Site Import/Export feature (Settings > Import / Export) by selecting the site and including Content in the export
The Wiki.dnn manifest shows only View, Settings, and ModuleCompanions controls - no Import/Export control is registered
The feature description may be misleading as it suggests a module-level Import/Export capability that does not exist as a standalone module action
